授業方法:
This course will be about 50-50 split between face to face classes and Zoom classes

We will do some classes online, but our initial meeting will be face to face.
In this course, students will engage in discussion, presentation, pair work and group work tasks in an all English classroom.

第13回:

トピック.授業計画1: Note: This syllabus may be subject to revisions according to student needs and abilities. Changes will be announced in class and override this document.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be expected to revise and prepare for tests. Students will be expected to do homework based on the textbook and elearning tools. Also, students will prepare for projects/presentations.

評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0: Dictionaries (electronic, smartphone, or paper) highly recommended
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Homework: 25%, Tests and Quizzes: 15%, Participation: 20%, Projects/Task/Presentations: 40%.
